source.name: Facility Registration System (FRS) Widget
source.description: The Facility Registry System (FRS) widget returns facilities in a user-specified area of interest that report to more than one EPA program system as reported by the Facility Registry System

datasets.name: Facility Registration System (FRS) Widget
datasets.description: The Facility Registry System (FRS) widget returns facilities in a user-specified area of interest that report to more than one EPA program system as reported by the Facility Registry System
